briefTitle: Promotora Navigator - Culturally Appropriate Patient Navigator
officialTitle: Assessing the Impact of a Community Health Worker on Hispanic Women's Reported Measures of Processes of Care in the Screening Mammography Setting
conditions: Breast Cancer, Screening Mammography, Community Health Worker
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Patient Reported Measures From Interpersonal Processes of Care Survey
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women
* Identifying as Hispanic ethnicity
* Age 40-64
* Tennessee resident

Exclusion Criteria:

* Personal history of breast cancer
* Current breast symptoms (palpable mass)
